messages.title: It is a two horse race in Guildford
messages.content: Everybody knows that here in Guildford it’s between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives. Guildford Liberal Democrats are known for working hard all year round. Voting Labour, Green or UKIP only helps the Conservatives win.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Kelly-Marie Blundell wants to help small businesses by lowering business rates.
Lib Dems have secured an extra £2 billion of funding for the NHS. Kelly-Marie Blundell and the Lib Dems want to raise that to £8 billion by 2020.

Kelly-Marie wants to see more childcare provided to help couples who want to go back to work. She says, 'If people want to go back to work, the costs of childcare shouldn't hold them back. I want to help working families get on in life.'

mentions.tacticalSituation: Guildford General Election Results 2010 indicate that Labour and UKIP cannot win here; it's a competition between Lib Dems and Conservatives.

issues.economy: Kelly-Marie Blundell wants to help small businesses by lowering business rates.
issues.health: Lib Dems have secured an extra £2 billion of funding for the NHS. Kelly-Marie Blundell and the Lib Dems want to raise that to £8 billion by 2020.
issues.socialWelfare: Kelly-Marie wants to see more childcare provided to help couples who want to go back to work.

leaflet.personalStatement: Kelly-Marie studied law at university and has since worked for a number of national charities. She is a passionate campaigner for fairness and equality.

images.caption: Kelly-Marie Blundell Campaigning to be Guildford's next MP

leaflet.additionalNotes: Strong local record. Strong national record.
